title: Ranga Ranga Lyrics Ivan Vera Madhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ranga Ranga 
Singer(s) : Rita
Lyricist : Mani amudhavan
Movie: Ivan Vera Mathiri (2013)
Music: Sathya.C

Yenda yenda yenda ranga
enga enga pona ranga
tension yeri kathurenda
standu standaa nikkurenda

enga mummy ya avan thitta vachitaan
enga engayo avan sutha vachitaan
kadupu yethi yethi yethi vittutaan

ai ranga, ranga ranga.. 
hey ranga ranga ranga .
ah ringa ringa ringa .. 

Yen nerama, en ketta nerama
pala boys-a pinna sutha vacha saabama
enna mattumaa ekka chakkamaa
ada innum yaara alaya vacha innum paavamaa

venumne enna sutha vachitaanaa
ingathaan engo olinjirukuraana

pillaiyaaru pillaiyaaru - en
kannil kaattu, avan yaaru yaaru
suthi suthiye nadu roatil nikkuren
inga enga thaeda thaeda
kootathoda kulambi nikkuren

Naan veg-u da, non-veg-u illa da
ada naalu ketta varthaiyaala thitta villada
nalla vela da, en mummy veg-u da
illana inneram meenu bajji da

Veyililil naanum kanjen karuvaadaa
un moonjikellaam meenu oru kedaa.

velakku paarka vaangi naayaa
vaasthu paarka vaanginaayaa
vandhadhaala thaan idhu vandhadhaala thaana
vazhkaiyellaam maaripochu
en pozhappu naari pochu da

ranga ranga ...
ringa ringa ...
